doc.title: Quest for Al-Qa'eda
doc.plot: Osama Bin Laden and his cronies must be hunted down and destroyed. You are dropped in the heart of Al-Qa'eda territory. You must fight your way through hordes of Osama's "men" in your Quest For Al-Qa'eda. A 1st person perspective shootem'up game on the order of DOOM and Duke Nukem 3D. This classic game received over two million downloads from 2002 to 2003.
